body:
Hi Ling,


The smoothing functions of tmesh2rad and gensurf should work adequately 
with all material types, including trans and trans2.  Prior to the 3.5 
official release, there was a bug in the code that caused the surfaces 
to look wrong when viewed from the backside, but this was fixed about a 
year ago.  If you are using Desktop Radiance or an older release of the 
software, this could be your problem.


-Greg
